title: World Without End [Exhibition Trailer]
brief_description: Trailer for the ACMI Screen Gallery Exhibition running from 13 April to 17 July 2005. Starting with the commissioned installation “History of a Day” WWE presents the subtle and dramatic forces of nature, the energies and rhythms of cities and the elastic time of global travel and communiication networks.
